Summary: Red Orange Orb Stationary above I-89. Near Burlington International airport.
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving on interstate, saw stationary orb red orange in color. We passed directly under orb. Airplane was descending to land nearby, definitely not an airplane. This was one light, not the multiple lights that blink like an airplane.
trends: There has been one other sighting in South Burlington
There were no other sightings in South Burlington on or around August 5th 2013
